name: frptools
description: Observable Property and Computed data streams

scripts.build:umd:min: npm run build:umd && uglifyjs -m --screw-ie8 -c -o dist/frptools.min.js dist/frptools.js
scripts.build:umd:gzip: npm run build:umd:min && gzip -c9 dist/frptools.min.js > dist/frptools.min.js.gz
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Timothy Farrell <tim@thecookiejar.me> (https://github.com/explorigin)
